content.rendered:
Directed by Lom Harsh.

Written by Lom Harsh.

Cast Gavie Chahal(Micky). Mohan Agashe(Prime Minister). Mohan Joshi(Tourist Minister). Lom Harsh(Tourist Minister Son) . Antara Banerjee(Reporter). Jan Bostock(Britisher). Karamveer Choudhary(PM Advisor Dashrath Singh (as Karmveer Choudhary)). Bikramjeet Kanwarpal(Interogation Officer). Ashutosh Kaushik(Pandit). Surendra Pal(Dadaji). Devesh Panwar(VJ). Arvind Sagar(Reporter). Sadanand Sharma(AJ). Vishal Sharma(Police Inspector). Haelyn Shastri(Reporter (as Hinal Bambhania)). Ajit Shidhaye(Micky’s Father). Rishank Tiwari(Negative). Deana Uppal(Jenny)

Language Hindi.

Production Dlb Film.
